    #include<cstdio>
    #include<iostream>
    #include<cmath>
    #include<cstring>
     
    #define EPS 1e-10
    using namespace std;
    double x[2502][2502];
    bool vis[2502][2502];
    int N,M,tc=1;
     
    double calc(int T,int K){
    if(T<0 || K<0)return 0;
    if((2*K)>=T) return (T/2.);
    if((vis[T][K])==true) return x[T][K];
    vis[T][K]=tc;
    double res=0;
    double tp;double tp2;
    double td;
    {
    tp=(double) K*1.0f/(T-K);
    res+= tp*(calc(T-2,K-1)+1);
    tp2=(1-tp)*K*1.0f/(T-K-1);
    res+= tp2*(calc(T-2,K)+2);
    }
    tp=tp+tp2;tp=1-tp;
    td=(calc(T-2,K)+1)/(T-K-K-1);
    td+=(calc(T,K+2)+1)*(T-K-K-2)/(T-K-K-1);
    res+=tp*td;
    x[T][K]=res;
    return res;
    }
     
     
    int main(){
    while(scanf("%d %d",&N, &M)!=EOF){
    int tot=N*M;
    printf("%0.4f\n", calc(tot,0));
    }
    return 0;
    }
